snippet: GOLDSCHMIDT--Beatrice. The Board of Directors, Officers and staff of Lighthouse Guild note with deepest sorrow the death of Beatrice Goldschmidt, mother of our esteemed Deputy Chairman and colleague Lawrence E. Goldschmidt. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to Larry, and the entire family on their loss of a wonderful mother and grandmother. James M. Dubin, Chairman, Board of Directors; Alan R. Morse, JD, PhD, President & CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOLDSCHMIDT--Beatrice. The Board of Directors, Officers and staff of Lighthouse Guild note with deepest sorrow the death of Beatrice Goldschmidt, mother of our esteemed Deputy Chairman and colleague Lawrence E. Goldschmidt. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to Larry, and the entire family on their loss of a wonderful mother and grandmother. James M. Dubin, Chairman, Board of Directors; Alan R. Morse, JD, PhD, President & CEO 1/3
